queries.sql: SET stageParallelism=2; SELECT * FROM {l} WHERE lval > 3
SET stageParallelism=2; SELECT * FROM {l} WHERE lval > 3 ORDER BY lval LIMIT 1
SET stageParallelism=2; SELECT key, SUM(lval) FROM {l} GROUP BY key
SET stageParallelism=2; SELECT {l}.key, {l}.lval, {r}.rval FROM {l} JOIN {r} ON {l}.key = {r}.key
SET stageParallelism=2; SELECT {l}.key, SUM({l}.lval + {r}.rval) FROM {l} JOIN {r} ON {l}.key = {r}.key GROUP BY {l}.key
SET stageParallelism=2; SELECT * FROM {l} WHERE lval NOT IN (SELECT rval FROM {r} WHERE rval > 2)
